## VisibleTileSet.updateRenderList() method

Calculates a new set of visible tiles.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updateRenderList(storageLevel: number, zoomLevel: number, dataSources: DataSource[], elevationRangeSource?: ElevationRangeSource): {
        viewRanges: ViewRanges;
        viewRangesChanged: boolean;
    };
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  storageLevel | number | The camera storage level, see \[\[MapView.storageLevel\]\]. |
|  zoomLevel | number | The camera zoom level. |
|  dataSources | [DataSource](./harp-mapview.datasource.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The data sources for which the visible tiles will be calculated. |
|  elevationRangeSource | [ElevationRangeSource](./harp-mapview.elevationrangesource.md) | Source of elevation range data if any. |

<b>Returns:</b>

{ viewRanges: ViewRanges; viewRangesChanged: boolean; }

view ranges and their status since last update (changed or not).
